definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: Maybe I'm going to Mount Emei next vacation. but I'm not sure.
sentences.chinese: 或许我可以在下个假期去峨眉山，但我不会去。

sentences.english: It's all set up very nicely for the Milan derby next weekend ...
sentences.chinese: 这对于下个周末的米兰德比是个不错的兆头。

sentences.english: Sorry , I think I'll sit out the next dance .
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我想坐会儿，等过了下个舞再跳。

sentences.english: Have a great plan for your next weekend or freetime?
sentences.chinese: 为你下个周末或空余时间做好安排了吗？
下个命名日就满十六了。

sentences.english: It would surprise few to imagine Europe having a harder decade than the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲下个十年会比美国更加艰难，这不难想象。

sentences.english: redefine my girlish notions of romance.
sentences.chinese: 让我为自己对爱情的见解下个定义。

sentences.english: Plan a trip to Chengde, China, for your next vacation!
sentences.chinese: 为你的下个假期计划去中国承德旅行吧。

sentences.english: But your next competitor will be even tougher.
sentences.chinese: 但是你的下个对手将会更强。

sentences.english: On my next day off, I don't want to gor for a drive.
sentences.chinese: 在我的下个休息日，我不想开车去兜风。

sentences.english: The rain continued falling/to fall all afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 这场雨整整一个下午都下个不停。

sentences.english: Day 176: I'll try to shake him at the next intersection.
sentences.chinese: 在下个路口我会想办法甩掉他的。

sentences.english: The government hopes to curtail public spending in the next tax year.
sentences.chinese: 政府希望在下个财税年度减少公家开支。

sentences.english: What are you doing next Saturday? We're having some people over for a meal.
I: I hope by next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我希望是在下个周末之前吧。

sentences.english: The bill will be considered when the Legislature reconvenes next Fall.
sentences.chinese: 议会下个秋季重新集合时会考虑这项议案。

definition: the next stop (of a bus etc)
when the moment comes/at that time
